Label.en: I like to imagine what my extended family look like...
Label.fr: Parfois j'essaye d'imaginer ce à quoi ressemble ma famille étendue...
Label.es: I like to imagine what my extended family look like...
Label.zh: I like to imagine what my extended family look like...

Label.en: My short term goal is to work hard and save money to visit them all!
Label.fr: Mon objectif à court terme c'est de travailler dur pour économiser et aller les voir !
Label.es: My goal is to work hard and save money to visit them all!
Label.zh: My goal is to work hard and save money to visit them all!

Label.en: Thanks... I like to think of myself as a resilient owl!
Label.fr: Merci...Je suis une chouette très déterminée !
Label.es: Thanks... I like to think of myself as a resilient owl!
Label.zh: Thanks... I like to think of myself as a resilient owl!

Label.en: Grandma Owl always said 'Be a model and an ideal. An example of what we can become and a precious help to achieve it'
Label.fr: Mamie Chouette disait toujours 'Soyez un modèle et un idéal. Un exemple de ce que l'on peut devenir et une aide précieuse pour y parvenir'
Label.es: Thanks... I like to think of myself as a resilient owl!
Label.zh: Thanks... I like to think of myself as a resilient owl!

Label.en: On the other hand she also said 'be yourself'. Sounds like conflicting injunctions to me!
Label.fr: D'une autre côté elle disait aussi d'être sois-même. Injonctions contradictoires ?
Label.es: Thanks... I like to think of myself as a resilient owl!
Label.zh: Thanks... I like to think of myself as a resilient owl!
